title: DO-00-006: OGE Reissues Summary of Criminal Statute at 18 U.S.C. § 207
summary:
OGE reissues a summary of 18 U.S.C. § 207. This edition incorporates three changes that were necessary to reflect statutory amendments in 1995 and 1996.  

Notes: [Note: Executive Order 12834, referenced in this DAEOgram, has been revoked.]
